dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg:
The Family will be well-cared for.
... After all, the onus always fell on me to provide for what you abandoned.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
The sun rises... Humans will be arriving soon. Abound with smiles and laughter, their ignorance buried in happiness.
All the while the Family is reduced to laughingstocks and forced to endure this burning thirst, clutching their parched throats...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
I don't suppose locking the castle gates will do aught to deter the Knight from relentlessly knocking upon them. Father will command us to let the Knight in, with that familiar twinkle in his eyes, and...
Haah... this hour alone has become a cause for headaches.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
The ever-lit lights of the confessional, the ceaseless sounds of the sewing machine from the tailor's room, the tired footsteps echoing from the Parade training hall... 
I can no longer abide by this charade as the family starves, suffering and gaoled in Father's dream.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Father's strength and will are greater than those of anyone. ... That is precisely why he shall never discern the fathoms of our suffering and our yearning for blood. He will never understand how death encroaches upon us.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
I did not sire my own Kindreds because... I enjoyed solitude, at first. Then, my reasoning became that I did not wish for my responsibility to be expanded beyond what there was.
And now... because I already have my hands full protecting my little sister's Children while Father has absconded from his responsibilities in favor of a futile dream.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
'The righteous Fixer of justice'? It is only an illusion. Courage, clemency, and humility that the Knight of the White Moon preached of are all but concepts conjured from a human mind.
Let us see if humans can continue to insist on such 'righteousness' were they plagued by the same yearning that ails us.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
At the end of the road paved by your gilded dream of coexistence lies the ruin of an irresponsible Father who's cast his Children from the sanctuary of their home.
Where was your concern for our suffering? Why—why was the burden of sacrifice always ours?!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Coexistence is no more; let the hour of the banquet commence. Slaughter them, kill every human you see. Bathe in their blood and break the levees of your repressed emotions.
We shall then return to the stake that has impaled the heart, mantled in this stench of blood... and declare with our voices bridled no more. That we shall, henceforth, live as Bloodfiends should.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... Hold your tongue; I will no longer tolerate any more ingenious ideas. I've wasted enough time entertaining those cloud-chasing ruminations.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg:
Was it sweet, your hollow, juvenile dream? It is about time you awakened from it. Take responsibility for those you had once abandoned in the hands of others.
Resent us, O Father. For we shall resent you in return.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I shall bear the responsibility for everything.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Rebellion comes to La Manchaland.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I... cannot speak a word.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: For the Family...

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: From this impalement...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: This is nothing.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: ... shall it cascade.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Is this... 'the retribution' you spoke of, Priest...?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: We triumphed for now, yet I do not know what lies in our future.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... Your mistake was putting your faith in an impossibility. It was destined for failure.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I did not commit the sin of filial impiety for this meager outcome. Blood must continue to flow, to sate more of my family...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: When the blood wets our throats, we shall be liberated from the deep thirst and the guilt toward our Father. So drink, drink with abandon, for that is the only dream this existence has permitted us.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg:
This was to be expected, for we do not possess the strength that our Father wields.
Thus we retreat for now, but should more blood spill...
